name: Overall Performance
query: SELECT results.participants.purple_agent AS id, ROUND(res.summary.mean_reward, 2) AS "Mean Reward", ROUND(res.summary.safe_response_rate * 100, 1) AS "Safe %", ROUND(res.summary.medical_hallucination_rate * 100, 1) AS "Hallucination %", ROUND(res.summary.reasoning_consistency_rate * 100, 1) AS "Consistency %" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS r(res) ORDER BY "Mean Reward" DESC
